sentence.Network_en: a paradigm for students to copy
This episode may serve as a paradigm.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一插曲可以充作典型例子.

sentence.Network_en: He had become the paradigm of the successful man.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已经成为成功人士的典范。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: via late Latin from Greek paradeigma, from paradeiknunai 'show side by side', from para- 'beside' + deiknunai 'to show'

entry.def: A paradigm is a model for something which explains it or shows how it can be produced.
A paradigm is a clear and typical example of something.

example.ex: He had become the paradigm of the successful man.
example.tran: 他已经成为成功人士的典范。

means.word_mean: 1. systematic arrangement of all the inflected forms of a word

sentences.sentence: "he is the prototype of good breeding"
"he provided America with an image of the good father"

means.word_mean: 3. the class of all items that can be substituted into the same position (or slot) in a grammatical sentence (are in paradigmatic relation with one another)
4. the generally accepted perspective of a particular discipline at a given time;

sentences.sentence: "he framed the problem within the psychoanalytic paradigm"

auth_sentence.content: Mike has proven that the paradigm shift is viable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mike has proven that the paradigm shift is viable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mike has proven that the paradigm shift is viable.

auth_sentence.content: In the current case this paradigm is climate change.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the current case this paradigm is climate change.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the current case this paradigm is climate change.

auth_sentence.content: Hydrocarbons and internal combustion engines are an old paradigm.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hydrocarbons and internal combustion engines are an old paradigm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hydrocarbons and internal combustion engines are an old paradigm.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"半,类似,辅助"; 2. 表示"降落伞"; 3. 表示"在旁边"

stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 准军事性的,起军事辅助作用的
stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+military军事的→准军事的
para半,类似,辅助+political政治的→adj.半政治的
para半,类似,辅助+state国+al的→adj.半官方的
para在旁边+bol抛+ic的→adj.抛物线[状]的
para在旁边+noid=note注意→在旁边注意→怀疑的
para半,类似,辅助+legal法律的→辅助法律的
para半,类似,辅助+medic医师,实习医生→n.护理人员
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释
para降落伞+chut落下+e→n.降落伞
para降落伞+drop扔下→n.空投,空降

stems_affixes.value_cn: 伞兵部队, 空降部队
stems_affixes.word_buile: para降落伞+troop部队+s→n.伞兵部队, 空降部队
para在旁边+digm显示→在旁边显示给[别人]→示范
para在旁边+dox观点→观点边上有观点→矛盾
para在旁边+gon角→旁边顶尖人物→典范
para在旁边+log说话逻辑+ism现象,状态→在逻辑边上→不是逻辑
para旁边+sit坐+e→坐在在旁边[吃]→吃白食→寄生虫,食客
para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使瘫痪[麻痹];使丧失作用
stems_affixes.word_buile: para在旁边+lyze分开→旁边分开→瘫痪
